title: Hereâ€™s how The New York Times calls winners on election night.
description: We rely on The Associated Press, but in some tightly contested races, we will evaluate the A.P. race calls before declaring a winner.

media:description: Workers counting ballots at the county election department in Las Vegas during the 2020 election.
